description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Lead Florence Face-Plant through 11 breathtaking levels of classic platforming action, solve tricky switch puzzles and unlock new skills to overcome the hazardous landscapes of Plantylon! Collect all the lost golden leaves, earn medals, unlock awardments and prove your platforming superiority in online rankings! Help this plant to chlorophyll-fill its destiny!
description.short: Lead Florence Face-Plant through 11 breathtaking levels of classic platforming action, solve tricky switch puzzles and unlock new skills to overcome the hazardous landscapes of Plantylon! Collect all the lost golden leaves, earn medals, unlock awardments and prove your platforming superiority in online rankings! Help this plant to chlorophyll-fill its destiny!
